text: If I could get any animal it would be a dolphin. I want one so bad. Me and my mom went swimming with dolphins and I was like, 'How do we get one of those?' and she was like, 'You can't get a dolphin. What are you gonna do, like, put it in your pool?'
author: Miley Cyrus

text: I'm not a religious person. My mom was of Jewish blood and my dad was Protestant.
author: Daniel Radcliffe

text: My dad believes in God, I think. I'm not sure if my mom does. I don't.
author: Daniel Radcliffe

text: Fortunately, when you're a mom, the responsibility of caring for your child can keep you going.
author: Shania Twain

text: My mom has made it possible for me to be who I am. Our family is everything. Her greatest skill was encouraging me to find my own person and own independence.
author: Charlize Theron
